reference.title: apiValue
reference.shortdesc: The <apiValue> element specifies a collection futures, such as constants, variables, enumerations, structures, or other named values.

section.title: Description
section.p: This element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> , <xref>, or other internal specialization type elements that refer to the <apiRef> element content (conref and keyref attributes). Use a unique key such as fully qualified classifier name for the named API reference. For instance, the full name of a method contains the method name that is qualified by the name of the class that provides the method and by the name of the package that, in turn, provides the class. You provide the name in the API reference topic. The fully qualified name is generated based on the API items that contain this item.
